snippet.title: 3DO : Dragon Tycoon Edge (JAP)
snippet.description:
Dragon Tycoon Edge (ドラゴン・タイクーン・エッジ) is a turn based RPG for the Panasonic 3DO system that developed by Sara Internationl and published by Sanyo (1995 ~ Japan).

In a distant and hostile galaxy, a god decides to summon you in order to take over it (galaxy).In the very beggining you have the morph of a psudo-human but later, you will be able to transform into everything (creature) you succeed to win.
